ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2001_01_10:
You wanna chat with me? That’s an odd
request.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You look
cheery as ever.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
All right. Let’s get harmonizin’ then,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2101_01_10: I’ve got no use for this, so I’ll give it to you.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2101_02_10: Just take it. Use it however you’d like.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Here—a gift from yours truly, Piers the
Melancholy. Go ahead and show it off.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Just think of it as my way of sayin’ thanks
for always gettin’ along with Marnie.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here’s a special present in honor of your
constant cheer, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
Can’t offer much other than that, except
maybe singin’ you a song.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I can give you front-row seats if you’ve
got a request.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Now then... What should we talk about?
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
The most I can offer is some simple
small talk.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Neither of us has anything in particular to
discuss, but I guess that’s just how we roll.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
You’ve got a knack for surprisin’ me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll have to give you somethin’ as thanks
for such a great present.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Let’s continue this some other time. We can
always chat.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Phew... We were both in the groove.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s have another session—one at our
own pace, just like Dark-type Pokémon.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
You can find inspiration for writin’ good
songs just about anywhere.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I don’t think spendin’ time here’ll ever be
a waste.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Even if I don’t gain anything from it, I’m
happy just natterin’ on about whatever.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
You’ve got a lot of people comin’ over to
talk to you, huh.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Popular people tend to stand out, so I guess
that means you’re in high demand.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
It’d be rough for me if I were in your shoes.
But if you’re havin’ fun, go ahead and keep
gettin’ yourself tangled up in that mess.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Marnie’s been takin’ a different approach 
than me to livening up our hometown.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
There’s no right way to do it, but as long as
we’re serious, our feelings can touch hearts.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
If you’ve also got somethin’ you’re serious
about, make sure you treasure it.
ch0256_00_nezz_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I could always send some support your way
with a yell.
